>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/beneficiary"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a list of all beneficiaries optionally filtered by subaccount ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"subaccountId","in":"query","description":"Optional subaccount ID","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
